attributes.action: Stop the merger of Sainsbury's and ASDA.
attributes.background: If the proposed merger goes ahead between these two retailers, this will result in job losses and higher prices due to reduced competition.

rejection.details:
This merger is likely to be subject to review by the Competition and Markets Authority (CMA).

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/sainsburys-asda-proposed-merger
